titleStmt.title: A True copy of a letter of consolation sent to Nat. the printer, near the Pope's Keys in Fetter-Lane, from the meal-tub midwife, in New-gate printed to prevent false, seditious and lying reports.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Nathaniel, d. 1687.
Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
